data.text: @Primary_Immune @OpenSciTalk I can see the headline already: "why survival of the fittest is toxic masculinity and must be stopped" "darwin is wrong but it is not what you think" "transhumanism solves the problem of micro evolution" "micro evolution is human sacrifice" "why old people shouldn't die"

@normaegraham1 Association between selective IgA deficiency and COVID-19
https://t.co/cIATxgWM7H
@Primary_Immune Have their been any studies done yet on Covid in people with IgA deficiency? TIA.

When we receive a COVID-19 shot, the immune system springs into action. It stimulates the production of antibodies...
It also activates memory cells that “remember” how to respond when infection occurs...
But those immune responses are blunted in immunocompromised people...
